dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: R script used to analyse flight initiation distance data
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: This is a plain text file contain the R script that we used to analyse the lizard FID data. It is self-explanatory, so no separate ReadMe file is provided.
